    • Uses of CoinAPIException in cryptotrader.trade

      Methods in cryptotrader.trade that throw CoinAPIException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HashMap<String,​Coin> CoinAPI.getData​(ArrayList<String> dataIn)
      Takes in the 3 letter name identifier of a coin and creates coin objects from the API call, then returns the map of coins
      double CoinAPI.getMarketCapForCoin​(String id, String date)
      Get the market cap of the coin with the specified ID at the time `date` in CAD.
      double CoinAPI.getPriceForCoin​(String id, String date)
      Get the price of coin with the specified ID at the time `date` in CAD.
      double CoinAPI.getVolumeForCoin​(String id, String date)
      Get the trading volume of the coin with the specified ID at the time `date` in CAD.
      static void CoinAPI.main​(String[] args)  

    • Uses of CoinAPIException in cryptotrader.user

      Methods in cryptotrader.user that throw CoinAPIException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void User.performTrades()
      Fetch relevant coin info from the CoinAPI and perform trades for all interested trading brokers in this user's trader list.
